author: chianca
title: Portuguese onboarding Video Series
description: Em todo o Brasil, o inglês não é falado rotineiramente e o português é o idioma.  As barreiras lingüísticas reduzem a participação no Catalyst.

f6_assessments.q0: A idéia é muito relevante e atende ao objetivo principal do desafio, que seria, neste caso, trazer conteúdo para os falantes de português, mais especificamente do Brasil, de forma simples e didática, através de vídeos no youtube. Em outras palavras, o objetivo de disseminar o conhecimento sobre nosso ecossistema seria certamente atingido, eu só acho que ainda havia necessidade de explicar melhor como seria feita a disseminação deste canal, como estes vídeos chegariam aos brasileiros? Porque é tão importante quanto o próprio conteúdo garantir como chegaria ao público, eu sou brasileiro e garanto, quase nada se sabe sobre Cardano ou Catalisador por aqui, um forte plano de divulgação é essencial para atingir o objetivo deste projeto de uma boa maneira. bem sucedida. Quanto à importância e relevância da criação de vídeos, é indiscutível o quanto eles são necessários e positivos. Também gostei muito do fato de os vídeos serem legendados, tanto em inglês quanto em português, quebrando a barreira que este projeto só beneficiaria os brasileiros, e também do cuidado que o autor tem em fazer uma versão escrita de cada vídeo, para garantir ainda mais que seu conteúdo seja solidamente compreendido. Se a questão da divulgação for destacada, acredito que o impacto será enorme e extremamente benéfico para o nosso ecossistema.
f6_assessments.q1: Infelizmente o autor nos fornece poucas informações sobre si mesmo; sabemos que ele faz parte da Escola Catalyst (um projeto que admiro muito), suas áreas de treinamento e como ele construiu para o ecossistema Cardano (SPO e tradutor). No entanto, senti falta de detalhes. Há quanto tempo ele trabalha na comunidade, exemplos de trabalhos anteriores, seja envolvendo nossa cadeia de bloqueio ou não, qual é seu papel na Escola Catalisadora, e assim por diante. Ele anexou um site para sua piscina, que, embora eu ache que ainda está em construção, está muito bem estruturada. Outro ponto que precisa ser melhorado seria a questão de um roteiro, o autor não nos informa quais passos seriam seguidos para atingir o objetivo final, sabemos que existem 10 vídeos e temos um exemplo de um pronto, o que nos permite visualizar qual seria o resultado final. . Mas é importante que saibamos com que freqüência esses vídeos seriam postados, onde os arquivos escritos estariam disponíveis e, sobretudo (na minha opinião): como seria o plano de divulgação. Bloqueio, universo criptográfico e Cardano são assuntos muito distantes do cotidiano da maioria dos brasileiros, então vamos pensar em uma maneira eficiente de disseminar este conteúdo? Quanto à divisão monetária, creio que temos informações suficientes e com um nível de detalhamento satisfatório. Sabemos para o que cada parte do financiamento seria utilizada. Então o que eu acho que estava faltando aqui era: 1) conhecer a freqüência dos vídeos 2) entender exatamente qual equipe estaria envolvida no projeto, além do autor, haveria tradutores, pessoas de design para montar as animações, etc., como funcionariam, como sua remuneração 3) o plano de marketing.
f6_assessments.q2: Acho que este projeto é até mesmo uma simples auditabilidade e o autor nos fornece várias maneiras de monitorar a proposta. Sabemos quais são os conteúdos de cada vídeo, para que possamos ver se eles estão realmente sendo lançados dessa forma, que seriam legendados em português e inglês, e que haveria documentos escritos acompanhando cada produção. Se soubéssemos a freqüência dos posts e onde o autor pretende divulgar este conteúdo, teríamos ainda mais ferramentas para trabalhar no monitoramento do projeto. O autor investiu muito no rastreamento de métricas para medir o sucesso de sua proposta, KPIs em vários aspectos, estabelecendo marcos que ele pretende alcançar com isso. Conhecemos o objetivo principal e pequenas metas que permitem, de forma progressiva, realizar o monitoramento. Também seria bom se alguns membros da comunidade de língua portuguesa fizessem o acompanhamento e dessem feedback à comunidade. Portanto, acredito que a auditabilidade é o ponto mais forte desta proposta, pois o autor nos dá muitas informações sobre ela.

f6_assessments.q0:
The idea is much valid and certainly can help increase portuguese speakers engagement in Cardano catalyst process. Problem statement and solution are clear. I liked that all the content they intend to create are already stated.
A few point I'd add to the proposal.
1) The great majority of the catalyst content is english. Videos explaining the processes can help the entrance but non-english speakers would still face barries when really getting in contact with proposals or submitting them. Does this project have in its scope any goal to help overcome these further barries? If not I would consider  the true impact of this proposal not very high as a lot of content to cover catalyst process already exist in eglish (-1 start/score)
2) What would be the communication plan within Brazilian (and portuguese native speakers as a whole)? Brazil is a very diverse country and it would be nice to see here what is its target audience, at least at first, and how to increase as it evolve. For instance, the project communication can start in universities of the main cities and evolves to high school students and employees in given sectors. Important to mention that not only the target audience is important but also the channels need to be considered. (-0,5 star/score)
 3) Ive seen a lot of proposals in last fund related to create educational videos in other languages to expand the reach to non-english speakers, very alike this one. It would be great to assess if some synergies could be made with these funded proposals and how to leverage theirs lessons learned (especially in relation to item 1 and 2). In the same sense, a further phase of this project could guide/help other proposers who want to do similar initiative with their language (elaborate a document or video with guidelines, provide some sort of consultancy, so on).
4) Id open some space for interacting with the enviroment created. Have Q&A, maybe in extra videos or in the podcasts, have space to audience propose topics for the videos, receive feedback, and so on. This is easly adjustable with the current proposal, it would just need to add some extra flexibility.
5) Last, regarding the content itself, maybe it will be important, before even speaking about Cardano/catalyst, explain the concept of cripto currencies and blockchain. Understanding this is the foundation of the whole process and one step behind the first episode proposed. (-0,5start/score)
f6_assessments.q1:
About the team, it seems to have only one person so far with experience in Catalyst but not clear if experienced in teaching or content creation. In this sense, I'd assume it would be necessary at least two extra people to edit the video and make sure they reach a their educational purpose (and also to add extra hands on scripting, translating, etc) (-1 star/score)
As for a plan, theres no clear schedule on when it is intended to launch each of the 10 videos (frequency) and how much time each of the steps in content creating it would take. (-1 star/score)
Last, regarding the budget, it is clear and breakdown seems fair.
f6_assessments.q2:
Good kpis already established. It would be nice to have some targets on them, it could be even targets evolving with time (for instacnce, increase viewers by 10% each month until month X, etc). Without these time-related targets, its hard to define what is success to this project. (-1 star/score)
Also, some milestones could be added but for this it would be necessary a more detailed schedule, which the proposal doesn't have. (-0,5 star/score)
No risk assessment was done. It would be interessting to have risks mapped on video quality, really engaging non english speakers in cardano, not reaching target audience and plans to mitigate them.  (-0,5 star/score)

f6_assessments.q0: Seeking to educate on Cardano through a series of mini-videos addresses the Challenge setting well. There are a growing number of sources to learn of Cardano but non cater to the Portuguese speaking individual. This further adds weight to the alignment of this proposal is to the Challenge. General make-up of the total Portuguese speaking population are also given, which are in the figures of hundreds of millions. These number further justifies this proposal on the basis of potential adoption. On the basis of the populations behavior though is not addressed. If even a video format is the effective method, but nonetheless any form of education is essential for Cardano.
f6_assessments.q1: Not much info has been given by the proposer other than the 'Relevant Experience' section which makes gauging this individual a real guesstimate. After going through the links provided, it does provide confidence. There is a link provided of a YouTube video that leads to The Catalyst School YouTube channel. In the particular video it is indeed a video in Portuguese and given an English subtitle proving to some degree this proposer can deliver on the goals intended. There is also a link to the proposers SPO, though only 4  (four) individuals has delegated to it and only contains a 1K pledge. Perhaps the intent was to show the proposer has skin-in-the-game. Budget is clearly broken down, though some posts are unclear. There is mentioning of a post for text and subtitle. Without further explanation, one could ask; 'What is the point of having text and subtitle, are they not basically the same thing?' Besides this issue, the budget is quite reasonable. The implementation plan though is not available, the proposer also has not taken into consideration risk and challenge they might face.
f6_assessments.q2: Roadmap unfortunately is almost non-existent, this includes the milestones. Though the syllabus has been clearly fleshed out. Numerous KPI's are also available though they would not be able to be measured for no numerical targets are available. The problem statement and solution are strongly interconnected, suggesting the proposers exactly knew what and how to achieve their goals.

f6_assessments.q0:
This proposal is about creating an educational mini-video series in the Portuguese language, with a simple and objective approach thru animation. The solution is clearly defined fit to the challenge, shows a clear impact on the ecosystem.
Based on the given information, I strongly agree that this proposal effectively addresses the challenge, I can rate it with a score of 5
f6_assessments.q1:
The solution is described clearly in detail (with a roadmap, KPIs (100% measurable), and a detailed budget breakdown (with the structure of items and explanations of calculation base). However, it is hard to verify the proposer's relevant ability and experience; and there is no information of demo/pilot is provided for showing proof of feasibility, and Risk is not provided.
Based on the given information, I am neutral with this proposal's feasibility, I can rate it with a score of 3.
f6_assessments.q2:
There is a lot of info provided [a detailed roadmap, KPIs (100% measurable), and a detailed budget breakdown (with the structure of items and explanations of calculation base)]. However, there is some info that should be added/clarified: (1) the proposer's relevant ability and experience [that can not be found through this link - https://brazilpool.com/] ; (2) information of demo/pilot for showing proof of feasibility, and (3) Risk as well as mitigation.
Based on the given information, I am neutral with this proposal's auditability, and I can rate it with a score of 3

solution: Nosso objetivo é criar uma série de mini-vídeo educativo em língua portuguesa, com uma abordagem simples e objetiva através da animação.
experience:
Contribuinte da The Catalyst School, Cardano Translator e SPO.
Graduação em Administração de Empresas e Direito.
